sentences.en: A drowning man will clutch at a straw.
sentences.cn: 即将溺死的人连一根草也要去抓.

sentences.en: Careless use of the clutch may damage the gears.
sentences.cn: 离合器使用不慎可能会损坏传动装置。

sentences.en: Clutch stair armrest, move carefully step by step.
sentences.cn: 抓紧楼梯扶手, 一步步谨慎地移动.

sentences.en: He clutched at a pillar for support.
sentences.cn: 他猛地抓住一根柱子作支撑。

sentences.en: He lost his clutch on the rope and fell.
sentences.cn: 他抓不住绳子,松手摔了下来.
昨天,他操纵这个离合器了.

sentences.en: His clutch was not tight enough and he fell from the scaffolder.
sentences.cn: 他没抓紧脚手架,跌了下来.

sentences.en: I staggered and had to clutch at a chair for support.
sentences.cn: 我踉踉跄跄地，不得不抓住一把椅子稳住自己。

sentences.en: Laura let out the clutch and pulled slowly away down the drive.
sentences.cn: 劳拉松开离合器踏板，沿车道慢慢驶离。

sentences.en: She released the clutch and the car began to move.
sentences.cn: 她放开离合器,汽车就动了.

sentences.en: She was clutching a bottle of champagne.
sentences.cn: 她手里紧紧抓着一瓶香槟酒。

sentences.en: Take your foot off the clutch after changing gear.
The brake ( pedal ) is between the clutch and the accelerator.
sentences.cn: 制动器 ( 踏板 ) 在离合器和加速器之间.

sentences.en: The party has attracted a clutch of young southern liberals.
sentences.cn: 聚会吸引了一群南部的年轻开明人士。

sentences.en: The pedals seem a bit off-centre and the clutch is rather stiff.
sentences.cn: 踏板似乎有点偏心，离合器也相当紧。

sentences.en: Tom fell to the ground clutching his stomach.
sentences.cn: 汤姆捂着肚子倒在地上。

sentences.en: Tony fell into the clutches of an attractive American who introduced him to drugs.
sentences.cn: 托尼落入一个有魅力的美国人的掌控，那人给他介绍毒品。

sentences.en: When the clutch broke, the car was locked into second gear.
sentences.cn: 离合器失灵后，汽车只能在二挡行驶。
